snippet: Andy Murray is ready for "one more big push" this week as he tries to steer defending champions Britain into the Davis Cup final....
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray is ready for "one more big push" this week as he tries to steer defending champions Britain into the Davis Cup final.

headline.print_headline: Murray in 'One More Push' as Britain Eye Final
headline.main: Murray in 'One More Push' as Britain Eye Final
